page.title: 05Farming in the Mark Area
page.content: {Working day on the farm. My dad gets up at 5 to 5.30 and gets dressed into his farming clothes,has a cup of tea and goes to work on his bike.Then he might take some bags of cake(calf rearing cake) out to the moor in the milking parlour, come back and hitch up the smallish tank to the trailer and go milking. He comes back about 9.30am and empties the milk into the big bulk tank which will then be sucked up into the milk tanker when it calls.He will have breakfast then perhaps move some cattle or sheep, collect bales of hay.Then clean out the bulk tank,go milking again and come back for tea at 5.00.In winter he would have to see to the straw bedding for the cows in the cubicles. The yard would have to be scrapped clear of slurry and put in the pit. In spring it would be used as field fertiliser.
